meanings.sent1: She is the crabbiest person in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The old man down the street is always the crabbiest on Mondays.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked crabbiest when it missed its nap.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered in the sky, looking crabbiest before the rain.
meanings.sent5: His face turned the crabbiest shade of red when he lost the game.

meanings.definition: Showing a bad temper or irritability
meanings.sent1: The crabbiest expression on her face warned everyone to stay away.
meanings.sent2: His crabbiest behavior made it hard for others to approach him.
meanings.sent3: The crabbiest squirrel in the park refused to share its nuts.
meanings.sent4: The crabbiest engine in the garage refused to start on a cold morning.
meanings.sent5: The crabbiest clouds in the sky threatened a storm.
